documentContentReferences.name: Amendment Change Reference to Study Assessments
documentContentReferences.description: Reference from the Protocol Amendment Summary of Changes Table to Section 8, detailing procedures for screening sites in the US.

documentContentReferences.name: COVID-19 Vaccine Risk Reference
documentContentReferences.description: Reference from Section 2.3.1.1 to Section 10.5 for potential risks and mitigation measures due to the COVID-19 vaccine.

documentContentReferences.name: Dose Modification Reference
documentContentReferences.description: Reference from Table 3 (Potential Risks and Mitigation Strategy) to Section 6.6 for dose modification or discontinuation criteria.

documentContentReferences.name: Adaptive Features Table Reference
documentContentReferences.description: Reference from Section 4.1 (Overall Design) to Table 4, which describes the adaptive features of the study.

documentContentReferences.name: Contraception Guidance Reference
documentContentReferences.sectionTitle: Contraceptive Guidance and Collection of Pregnancy Information
documentContentReferences.description: Reference from Section 5.3 (Lifestyle Considerations) to Section 10.4 for details on appropriate contraceptive methods.

documentContentReferences.name: Discontinuation Procedures Reference
documentContentReferences.description: Reference from Section 7.1 (Discontinuation of Study Intervention) to the SoA for data to be collected at the time of discontinuation.

documentContentReferences.name: AE/SAE Procedures Reference
documentContentReferences.sectionTitle: Adverse Events: Definitions and Procedures for Recording, Evaluating, Follow-up, and Reporting
documentContentReferences.description: Reference from Section 8.3.2 to Section 10.3 for methods of recording, evaluating, and assessing causality of AEs and SAEs.

documentContentReferences.name: Investigator's Brochure Reference
documentContentReferences.description: External reference to the Investigator's Brochure (IB) from Table 3 for data on ALXN1840 risks.

documentContentReferences.name: Study Schematic Figure Reference
documentContentReferences.description: Listing of Figure 1 in the List of Figures on page 8.

commentAnnotations.text: Medical Monitor Name and Contact Information can be found in the Study Contact List.

This amendment is considered to be substantial based on the criteria set forth in Article 10(a) of Directive 2001/20/EC of the European Parliament and the Council of the European Union, the US Food and Drug Administration’s (FDA) regulation at 21 CFR part 312.30(b), and any applicable local regulations.
commentAnnotations.sourceSection: Protocol Amendment Summary of Changes Table

commentAnnotations.text: To align the number of days with the mention of zinc discontinuation elsewhere in the protocol.
commentAnnotations.sourceSection: Protocol Amendment Summary of Changes Table

commentAnnotations.text: Abbreviations: ALT = alanine aminotransferase; AST = aspartate aminotransferase; IB = Investigator’s Brochure; PK = pharmacokinetics; WD = Wilson disease.
commentAnnotations.sourceSection: Table 3: Potential Risks and Mitigation Strategy

commentAnnotations.text: Abbreviations: CRF = case report form; CRU = clinical research unit; EOS = End of Study; SoA = Schedule of Activities.
Abbreviations: ICF = informed consent form; PD = pharmacodynamic; PK = pharmacokinetic.

studyDefinitionDocumentVersions.description: Current protocol version. Clarifies study procedures in the US to facilitate recruitment.
